meanings.definition: A type of embroidery using crewel yarn on a plain fabric.

meanings.sent2: The crewelwork on the pillow added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the crewelwork, thinking it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: Her crewelwork was like a colorful painting stitched onto the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The intricate crewelwork depicted a serene landscape with blooming flowers.
